ISSUE.TITLE: Use can't download dataset before saving query
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Because the query results url contains the query id, before saving the user can't download the dataset. We need to allow addressing query results without query id.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #68: user can't download query results of a new query
